field.name: EXCLK_DIV
field.desc: Only applies to APB periperals: UART, I2S, I2C, SSI, SADC, OTG, etc

field.name: PLL_DIV
field.desc: Only applies to MSC, I2S, LCD, UHC, OTG, SSI, PCM, GPU and GPS.

node.name: RTC
node.title: Real time clock module(RTC) address definition

node.name: GPIO
node.title: General purpose I/O port module(GPIO) address definition

node.name: ACCAR
node.title: AIC controller AC97 codec command address register

node.name: ACCDR
node.title: AIC controller AC97 codec command data register

node.name: ACSAR
node.title: AIC controller AC97 codec status address register

node.name: ACSDR
node.title: AIC controller AC97 codec status data register

node.name: I2SDIV
node.title: AIC controller I2S/MSB-justified clock divider register

node.name: RGADW
node.title: ICDC internal register access control register

node.name: RGDATA
node.title: ICDC internal register data output register

field.name: SEND_CCSD
field.desc: send command completion signal disable to ceata

field.name: SEND_AS_CCSD
field.desc: send internally generated stop after sending ccsd

field.name: AUTO_CMD_DONE
field.desc: 12 is internally generated by controller has finished

field.name: CRC_WRITE_ERROR
field.desc: No CRC status is sent back

field.name: RTS
field.desc: 0: RTS_ output high, 1: RTS_ output low

field.name: RFER
field.desc: 0: no receive error 1: receive error in FIFO mode

field.name: TEMT
field.desc: 1: transmit FIFO and shift registers empty

field.name: BRK
field.desc: 0: no break detected 1: receive a break signal

field.name: DR
field.desc: 0: receive FIFO is empty 1: receive data is ready

field.name: TDPL
field.desc: 0: encoder generates a positive pulse for 0

field.name: TPWS
field.desc: 0: transmit 0 pulse width is 3/16 of bit length, 1: 0 pulse width is 1.6us for 115.2Kbps

field.name: RSIRE
field.desc: 0: receiver is in UART mode 1: SIR mode

field.name: TSIRE
field.desc: 0: transmitter is in UART mode 1: SIR mode

field.name: FDIV
field.desc: SCC_CLK frequency is half of device clock

field.name: EACLRUN
field.desc: hardware auto clear underrun when TxFifo no empty

field.name: FRMHL
field.desc: SSI_CE_ is high valid and SSI_CE2_ is high valid

node.name: SHCNT
node.title: I2C standard mode high count register

node.name: SLCNT
node.title: I2C standard mode low count register

node.name: FHCNT
node.title: I2C fast mode high count register

node.name: FLCNT
node.title: I2C fast mode low count register

node.name: CINTR
node.title: I2C Clear Combined and Individual Interrupts

field.name: SLVACT
field.desc: Slave FSM is not in IDLE state

field.name: MSTACT
field.desc: Master FSM is not in IDLE state

field.name: I2CEN
field.desc: when read as 1, i2c is deemed to be in an enabled state, when read as 0, i2c is deemed completely inactive. The cpu can, safely read this bit anytime .When this bit is read as 0 ,the cpu can, safely read SLVRDLST and SLVDISB

node.name: PENWAIT
node.title: ADC Wait Pen Down Time Register

field.name: PEN_0
field.desc: PID filter enable bit for PID

field.name: USE_0
field.desc: serial mode data pin select: 0 for TSDI7, 1 for TSDI0

field.name: DTRM
field.desc: FIFO data trigger interrupt mask bit

field.name: DTR
field.desc: FIFO data trigger interrupt flag bit

field.name: BSR
field.desc: Nand and SDRAM Bus Share Select: 0, share; 1, unshare

node.name: SACR
node.title: Static Memory Bank Addr Config Reg

node.name: OTP
node.title: OTP (One Time Programmable Module) [not sure about the address]

field.name: ENDIAN
field.desc: 0 Little data endian, 1 Big data endian

field.name: DPDN
field.desc: 0 DDR memory is NOT in deep-power-down state, 1 DDR memory is in deep-power-down state

field.name: PDN
field.desc: 0 DDR memory is NOT in power-down state, 1 DDR memory is in power-down state

field.name: AREF
field.desc: 0 DDR memory is NOT in auto-refresh state, 1 DDR memory is in auto-refresh state

field.name: SREF
field.desc: 0 DDR memory is NOT in self-refresh state, 1 DDR memory is in self-refresh state

field.name: CKE1
field.desc: 0 CKE1 Pin is low, 1 CKE1 Pin is high

field.name: CKE0
field.desc: 0 CKE0 Pin is low, 1 CKE0 Pin is high

field.name: MPRT
field.desc: Miss CS protect: 0 will lock the bus on fault, 1 will return random data

field.name: CS1EN
field.desc: 0 DDR Pin CS1 un-used, 1 There're DDR memory connected to CS1

field.name: CS0EN
field.desc: 0 DDR Pin CS0 un-used, 1 There're DDR memory connected to CS0

field.name: ACTPD
field.desc: 0 Precharge all banks before entering power-down, 1 Do not precharge banks before entering power-down

field.name: PRET
field.desc: Precharge active bank after 128 tCK idle

field.name: SR
field.desc: 1 Drive external DDR device entering self-refresh mode, 0 Drive external DDR device exiting self-refresh mode

field.name: UNALIGN
field.desc: 0 Disable unaligned transfer on AXI BUS, 1 Enable unaligned transfer on AXI BUS

field.name: ALH
field.desc: Advanced Latency Hiding: 0 Disable ALH, 1 Enable ALH

field.name: RDC
field.desc: 0 dclk clock frequency is lower than 60MHz, 1 dclk clock frequency is higher than 60MHz

field.name: CKE
field.desc: 0 Not set CKE Pin High, 1 Set CKE Pin HIGH

field.name: START
field.desc: 0 No command is performed, 1 On the posedge of START, perform a command defined by CMD field

field.name: TRAS
field.desc: ACTIVE to PRECHARGE command period (2 * tRAS + 1)

field.name: TRCD
field.desc: ACTIVE to READ or WRITE command period.

field.name: TRRD
field.desc: ACTIVE bank A to ACTIVE bank B command period.

field.name: TWR
field.desc: WRITE Recovery Time defined by register MR of DDR2 memory

field.name: TXP
field.desc: EXIT-POWER-DOWN to next valid command period.

field.name: TMRD
field.desc: Load-Mode-Register to next valid command period.

field.name: CON
field.desc: Constant value used to compare with CNT value.

field.name: CLKD
field.desc: CLKD is reference value for setting WDQS and RDQS.

field.name: WDQS
field.desc: Set delay element number to write DQS delay-line.

field.name: RDQS
field.desc: Set delay element number to read DQS delay-line.

field.name: WSIGN
field.desc: The sign of WDQS value for WRITE DQS delay

field.name: WDQS
field.desc: The adjust value for WRITE DQS delay

field.name: RSIGN
field.desc: The sign of RDQS value for READ DQS delay

field.name: RDQS
field.desc: The adjust value for READ DQS delay

field.name: TSEL
field.desc: Ready delay select: adds betweee 0 and 3tCK

field.name: MSEL
field.desc: Mask delay select: adds betweee 0 and 3tCK

field.name: TVEPEH
field.desc: TVE PAL enable extra halfline signal

field.name: FUHOLD
field.desc: hold pixel clock when outFIFO underrun

field.name: PALBP
field.desc: bypass data format and alpha blending

field.name: TVEN
field.desc: indicate the terminal is lcd or tv

field.name: RECOVER
field.desc: Auto recover when output fifo underrun

field.name: VPS
field.desc: VSYNC pulse start in line clock, fixed to 0

field.name: VPE
field.desc: VSYNC pulse end in line clock

field.name: HPS
field.desc: HSYNC pulse start position in dot clock

field.name: HPE
field.desc: HSYNC pulse end position in dot clock

field.name: HT
field.desc: Horizontal Total size in dot clock

field.name: VT
field.desc: Vertical Total size in dot clock

field.name: HDS
field.desc: Horizontal display area start in dot clock

field.name: HDE
field.desc: Horizontal display area end in dot clock

field.name: VDS
field.desc: Vertical display area start in line clock

field.name: VDE
field.desc: Vertical display area end in line clock

field.name: PSS
field.desc: PS signal start position in dot clock

field.name: PSE
field.desc: PS signal end position in dot clock

field.name: CLSS
field.desc: CLS signal start position in dot clock

field.name: CLSE
field.desc: CLS signal end position in dot clock

field.name: SPLS
field.desc: SPL signal start position in dot clock

field.name: SPLE
field.desc: SPL signal end position in dot clock

field.name: REVS
field.desc: REV signal start position in dot clock

field.name: PINMD
field.desc: This register set Pin distribution in 16-bit parallel mode, 0: 16-bit data correspond with LCD_D[15:0], 1: 16-bit data correspond with LCD_D[17:10], LCD_D[8:1]

field.name: QDM
field.desc: LCD quick disable done interrupt mask

field.name: ODDRGB
field.desc: odd line serial RGB data arrangement

field.name: EVENRGB
field.desc: even line serial RGB data arrangement

field.name: SOFM1
field.desc: Start of frame interrupt mask for foreground 1

field.name: EOFM1
field.desc: End of frame interrupt mask for foreground 1

field.name: SOFM0
field.desc: Start of frame interrupt mask for foreground 0

field.name: EOFM0
field.desc: End of frame interrupt mask for foreground 0

field.name: ENDM
field.desc: End of frame interrupt mask for panel.

field.name: SOF1
field.desc: Start of frame flag for foreground 1

field.name: EOF1
field.desc: End of frame flag for foreground 1

field.name: SOF0
field.desc: Start of frame flag for foreground 0

field.name: EOF0
field.desc: End of frame flag for foreground 0

field.name: YPOS
field.desc: Y position bit of foreground 0 or 1

field.name: XPOS
field.desc: X position bit of foreground 0 or 1

node.name: CNUM0_PART2
node.title: Foreground Size in Descriptor PART2 Register

field.name: CLBAR
field.desc: Color bar mode:0-Output input video to TV,1-Output color bar to TV

field.name: VSP
field.desc: VSYNC Polarity:0-rising edge active,1-falling edge active

field.name: HSP
field.desc: HSYNC Polarity:0-rising edge active,1-falling edge active

field.name: DMA_SYNC
field.desc: when change DA, do frame sync

field.name: LPF
field.desc: Lines per freame for csc output image

field.name: PPL
field.desc: Pixels per line for csc output image, should be an even number

field.name: EACKS_LOW
field.desc: External DACK Output Level Select, active low

field.name: EACKM_WRITE
field.desc: External DACK Output Mode Select, output in write cycle

field.name: DS
field.desc: transfer data size of a data unit

field.name: LASTMD1
field.desc: BCH Decoding last mode 1, there's two descriptor for decoding blcok

field.name: BERR
field.desc: BCH error within this transfer, Only for channel 0

field.name: BUERR
field.desc: BCH uncorrectable error, only for channel 0

field.name: EACKS_LOW
field.desc: External DACK Output Level Select, active low

field.name: EACKM_WRITE
field.desc: External DACK Output Mode Select, output in write cycle

field.name: DS
field.desc: transfer data size of a data unit
